Subject: Magsaysay Award
data: 1 Who was the first Indian to win Ramon Magsaysay Award ? A Satyajit Ray B Vinobha Bhave C M.S. Subhalakshmi D Arun Shourie Answer: Option [B]
2 Who amidst the following eminent Indian journalists was conferred the Magsaysay Award ? A Kushwant Singh B Deep Joshi C Arun Shourie D Lakshminarayan Ramdas Answer: Option [C]
3 Ramon Magsaysay Award is named after the former President of : A Indonesia B Thailand C Philippines D South Korea Answer: Option [C]
4 Kiran Bedi received Magsaysay Award for government service in : A 1992 B 1993 C 1994 D 1995 Answer: Option [C]
5 In which field Arvind Kejriwal won Ramon Magsaysay Award in 2006 ? A Emergent Leadership B Community Leadership C Peace and International understanding D Public Service Answer: Option [A]
